mapper.select: SELECT NO, NM, POST_CODE, ADDR, BETTER_ADDR, RATING, PRICE_GROUP, CONTACT, SALES_TIME, HOLIDAY, PARKING_YN, THUMB, VIEW_COUNT FROM TB_RS
SELECT NO, NM, POST_CODE, ADDR, BETTER_ADDR, RATING, PRICE_GROUP, CONTACT, SALES_TIME, HOLIDAY, PARKING_YN, THUMB, VIEW_COUNT FROM TB_RS WHERE NO=#{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RS (NO, NM, POST_CODE, ADDR, BETTER_ADDR, RATING, PRICE_GROUP, CONTACT, SALES_TIME, HOLIDAY, PARKING_YN, THUMB) VALUES (#{no}, #{nm}, #{post_code}, #{addr}, #{better_addr}, #{rating}, #{price_group}, #{contact}, #{sales_time}, #{holiday}, #{parking_yn}, #{thumb})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RS SET NM=#{nm}, POST_CODE=#{post_code}, ADDR=#{addr}, BETTER_ADDR=#{better_addr}, RATING=#{rating}, PRICE_GROUP=#{price_group}, CONTACT=#{contact}, SALES_TIME=#{sales_time}, HOLIDAY=#{holiday}, PARKING_YN=#{parking_yn}, THUMB=#{thumb} WHERE NO=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT NO, NM, POST_CODE, ADDR, BETTER_ADDR, RATING, PRICE_GROUP, CONTACT, SALES_TIME, HOLIDAY, PARKING_YN, THUMB, VIEW_COUNT FROM tb_rs ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{randomCount}
